column4: Is there any command that will display the access of a file like "read write and execute" rather then rwe?
i am not aware of anything that spells out permissions - may i ask why you want that?
for a script
you should be able to read the input of rwx just as easily (if not easier) than the words read write execute
but i obviously don't know what/how you're doing it so maybe that won't work for you
that true, but I want it printed for the user
modify your script to output "read" if the value is r--, "read, write" if the value is rw-, etc etc
tought about that but it is quite a job
what language your using?
